TestCase.name: testGroupAggregate
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(a) AS count$0]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithAverage
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[$0], EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[AVG($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a0=[CAST($0):DOUBLE]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, AVG((sum$0, count$1)) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, AVG(a0) AS (sum$0, count$1)]) +- Calc(select=[b, CAST(a) AS a0]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithExpressionInSelect
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[MIN($2)], EXPR$1=[AVG($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[MOD($1, 3)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, MIN(min$0) AS EXPR$0, AVG((sum$1, count$2)) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, MIN(c) AS min$0, AVG(a) AS (sum$1, count$2)]) +- Calc(select=[a, MOD(b, 3) AS d, c]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithConstant1
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(four=[$1], EXPR$0=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], four=[4], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[4 AS four, EXPR$0]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, SUM(b) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, b]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithConstant2
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(four=[$1], EXPR$0=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], four=[4], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[4 AS four, EXPR$0]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[b, a]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$0], EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[CAST(2) AS b, EXPR$0]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[(b = 2)]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
